video.title: Legends
video.synopsis: Shedding his skin as easily as a snake, CIA operative Martin Odum becomes whoever he needs to be in this gripping spy drama.

episodes.synopsis: Martin Odum is a seasoned deep-cover operative who changes personas for each assignment. But knowing the real Martin is getting harder, even for him.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When a chemistry teacher with a dark past is abducted, Martin, Crystal and Troy go undercover to get him back before he's forced to make a deadly gas.
episodes.title: Chemistry

episodes.synopsis: Martin's new legend is an international arms dealer trying to buy deadly nerve gas. A liaison with Chechen arms dealer Ana brings complications.
episodes.title: Lords of War

episodes.synopsis: A nerve gas purchase comes back to haunt Martin as one of the Chechens threatens increasing deadly attacks if Ana and the Colonel are not released.
episodes.title: Betrayal

episodes.synopsis: While on leave, Martin travels off-book in Houston to hunt down more clues about himself and assume the identity of a flamboyant Southern crook.
episodes.title: Rogue

episodes.synopsis: After Martin's Houston escapade, he and his prisoner go on the run to evade professional killers hired by the mysterious Verax Corporation.
episodes.title: Gauntlet

episodes.synopsis: Martin's new legend is a journalist shadowing Hani Jabril, a charismatic women's rights activist who may be plotting to assassinate a Saudi prince.
episodes.title: Quicksand

episodes.synopsis: The DCO and Martin decide to keep his journalist legend going for an off-book operation to uncover the truth behind the Hani Jabril case.
episodes.title: Iconoclast

episodes.synopsis: While searching for the kidnapped Sonya and Aiden, Martin stumbles upon some information that may connect his past to players in a recent case.
episodes.title: Wilderness of Mirrors

episodes.synopsis: Martin uncovers an assassination plot and possible government infiltration. As Martin faces mortal danger, events from his past come into focus.
episodes.title: Identity
